name: 鲁德赫拉什·贾斯瓦尔
name_full: 鲁德赫拉什·贾斯瓦尔 Rudhraksh Jaiswal
introduction: Rudhraksh Jaiswal embarked on his career journey In 2013, securing the role of Sahadev in the epic "Mahabharata". Transitioning to the silver screen, he showcased his talent in films such as "Noor" (2017) and "The Tenant" (2023). His latest milestone includes a significant role in the ensemble cast of the acclaimed film "Extraction (2020)," helmed by director Sam Hargrave and scripted by Joe Russo. Jaiswal's repertoire also extends to a web series, notably starring in the Amazon Prime series "Crushed" (2021-2024) as the lead character Samvidhan. Additionally, he has lent his presence to advertisements for prominent brands such as Dell, Samsung, Google Pay, and Pepsi.
